name: Neko Atsume Purrfect
storyline: In this game, you can do more than just leisurely observe free-spirited cats; you can play with them using a cat teaser, stroke their bellies, and even pick them up for a cuddle. At the delightful yard location, home to uniquely charming cats like "Calico cat," "Odd-eyed cat," and "Big fat cat," you are sure to encounter your purrfect feline companion.
summary: Neko Atsume Purrfect is a cat collecting VR game. Players will be able to collect and interact with VR cats from petting, playing, and more in augmented reality.
